page.title: 02The Seward Family.
page.content: My Mom and Dad came to Rugeley in 1972. The reason was they were looking for a house to buy and in Birmingham where they come from the prices were too high. Looking through the papers they saw a bungalow advertised at a price nearer to what they could afford. Coming to see the bungalow, they liked it, and the area straight away; on looking around they found out that shops, schools and buses were all at hand. That is how they came to live at Rugeley. My Dad is a fireman at Erdington. He has been working at this station for 3 years though he's been a fireman for 21 years. He gets a medal next month for good conduct and service. Since joining the fire service Dad has worked at Kings Norton, Billesley,Bordesley Green Sutton Coldfield. Dad travels to work at 7.45am by car.
